channel.title: Khabardaar Podcast
channel.itunes:subtitle: Your weekly Bollywood fix
channel.itunes:author: Khabardaar Podcast
channel.itunes:summary: Khabardaar is a weekly Hindi language podcast discussing Bollywood movies. Hosted by lifelong Bollywood fans Aparita Bhandari and Baisakhi Roy, it offers an in-depth look at the Hindi film industry.
channel.description: Khabardaar is a weekly Hindi language podcast discussing Bollywood movies. Hosted by lifelong Bollywood fans Aparita Bhandari and Baisakhi Roy, it offers an in-depth look at the Hindi film industry.

item.title: #18 Sanju
item.itunes:summary: Episode 18: Sanju purports to give audiences the true story of Sanjay Dutt, told straight by Sanjay baba himself, warts and all – no intermediaries or anonymous sources. Why is the film so superficial then?>
item.description: Episode 18: Sanju purports to give audiences the true story of Sanjay Dutt, told straight by Sanjay baba himself, warts and all – no intermediaries or anonymous sources. Why is the film so superficial then?>

item.title: #17 Lust Stories
item.itunes:summary: Episode 17: After Bombay Talkies (2013), four famous Bollywood or Hindi cinema directors - Anurag Kashyap, Zoya Akhtar, Dibakar Banerjee and Karan Johar - come together to make a Netflix special, a four film anthology called Lust Stories.>
item.description: Episode 17: After Bombay Talkies (2013), four famous Bollywood or Hindi cinema directors - Anurag Kashyap, Zoya Akhtar, Dibakar Banerjee and Karan Johar - come together to make a Netflix special, a four film anthology called Lust Stories.>

item.title: #16 Veere Di Wedding
item.itunes:summary: Episode 16: Veere Di Wedding shows girls can have fun and make a box-office hit too! Starring Kareena Kapoor Khan, Sonam K. Ahuja, Swara Bhaskar and Shikha Talsania.>
item.description: Episode 16: Veere Di Wedding shows girls can have fun and make a box-office hit too! Starring Kareena Kapoor Khan, Sonam K. Ahuja, Swara Bhaskar and Shikha Talsania.>

item.title: #15 7 Din Mohabbat In
item.itunes:summary: Episode 15: Pakistani stars Mahira Khan and Sheheryar Munawar Siddiqui talk about their latest film 7 Din Mohabbat In.>
item.description: Episode 15: Pakistani stars Mahira Khan and Sheheryar Munawar Siddiqui talk about their latest film 7 Din Mohabbat In.>

item.title: #14 Raazi
item.itunes:summary: Episode 14: Starring Alia Bhatt, Raazi shines a spotlight on the true story of an unlikely female spy.>
item.description: Episode 14: Starring Alia Bhatt, Raazi shines a spotlight on the true story of an unlikely female spy.>

item.title: #13 Sonu Ke Titu Ki Sweety
item.itunes:summary: Episode 13: Are Luv Ranjan films such as Pyaar Ka Punchnama and Sonu Ke Titu Ki Sweety misogynistic? Aparita and Baisakhi debate in two episodes.>
item.description: Episode 13: Are Luv Ranjan films such as Pyaar Ka Punchnama and Sonu Ke Titu Ki Sweety misogynistic? Aparita and Baisakhi debate in two episodes.>

item.title: #12 Pyaar Ka Punchnama
item.itunes:summary: Episode 12: Are Luv Ranjan films such as Pyaar Ka Punchnama and Sonu Ke Titu Ki Sweety misogynistic? Aparita and Baisakhi debate in two episodes.>
item.description: Episode 12: Are Luv Ranjan films such as Pyaar Ka Punchnama and Sonu Ke Titu Ki Sweety misogynistic? Aparita and Baisakhi debate in two episodes.>

item.title: #11 Shakespeare Wallah
item.itunes:summary: Episode 11: A look at Tungrus, a contemporary Indian documentary, and Shakespeare Wallah, the Merchant Ivory classic starring Shashi Kapoor, Felicity Kendal and Madhur Jaffray.>
item.description: Episode 11: A look at Tungrus, a contemporary Indian documentary, and Shakespeare Wallah, the Merchant Ivory classic starring Shashi Kapoor, Felicity Kendal and Madhur Jaffray.>

item.title: #10 October
item.itunes:summary: Episode 10: Shoojit Sircar’s latest film October contemplates the journey of Dan (Varun Dhawan) as he comes to appreciate his life while facing his colleague Shiuli’s (Banita Sandhu) brush with death.>
item.description: Episode 10: Shoojit Sircar’s latest film October contemplates the journey of Dan (Varun Dhawan) as he comes to appreciate his life while facing his colleague Shiuli’s (Banita Sandhu) brush with death.>

item.title: #9 Cake
item.itunes:summary: Episode 9: Starring Sanam Saeed and Aamina Sheikh in leading roles, Asim Abbasi’s debut film Cake steps away from the traditional formula of Pakistani films.>
item.description: Episode 9: Starring Sanam Saeed and Aamina Sheikh in leading roles, Asim Abbasi’s debut film Cake steps away from the traditional formula of Pakistani films.>

item.title: #8 Blackmail
item.itunes:summary: Episode 8: Irrfan Khan’s latest film Blackmail has been billed as a dark comedy. Early reviews also called it a satire on marriage. Aparita and Baisakhi discuss whether the movie truly lives up to the potential of its premise.>
item.description: Episode 8: Irrfan Khan’s latest film Blackmail has been billed as a dark comedy. Early reviews also called it a satire on marriage. Aparita and Baisakhi discuss whether the movie truly lives up to the potential of its premise.>

item.title: #7 Farooq Sheikh
item.itunes:summary: Episode 7: A special episode on Farooq Sheikh. With Baisakhi Roy away on vacation, Aparita Bhandari looks at the work of the veteran Bollywood actor, beloved by his fans, who died of a heart attack on 28 December 2013.>
item.description: Episode 7: A special episode on Farooq Sheikh. With Baisakhi Roy away on vacation, Aparita Bhandari looks at the work of the veteran Bollywood actor, beloved by his fans, who died of a heart attack on 28 December 2013.>

item.title: #6 Hichki
item.itunes:summary: Episode 6: Hichki marks the return of Rani Mukherji in the role of a teacher with Tourette Syndrome. After a round of Geeton Ka Ghanchakkar and Filmi Khabrein, we discuss how disability has been portrayed in Bollywood films in our main segment Bollywood Behes.>
item.description: Episode 6: Hichki marks the return of Rani Mukherji in the role of a teacher with Tourette Syndrome. After a round of Geeton Ka Ghanchakkar and Filmi Khabrein, we discuss how disability has been portrayed in Bollywood films in our main segment Bollywood Behes.>

item.title: #5 Pyaasa
item.itunes:summary: Episode 5: In our fifth episode, we look at Pyaasa, a cult classic Bollywood film. After a round of Geeton Ka Ghanchakkar (The Pyaasa Edition) and Filmi Khabrein, we discuss what makes Pyaasa such an iconic Hindi film as part of our main segment Bollywood Behes.>
item.description: Episode 5: In our fifth episode, we look at Pyaasa, a cult classic Bollywood film. After a round of Geeton Ka Ghanchakkar (The Pyaasa Edition) and Filmi Khabrein, we discuss what makes Pyaasa such an iconic Hindi film as part of our main segment Bollywood Behes.>

item.title: #4 Pari
item.itunes:summary: Episode 4: In our fourth episode, we look at Pari and Bollywood’s latest take on the horror film genre. After a round of Geeton Ka Ghanchakkar (The Horror Edition) and Filmi Khabrein, we discuss how Pari fits into the Bollywood horror films tradition as part of our main segment Bollywood Behes.>
item.description: Episode 4: In our fourth episode, we look at Pari and Bollywood’s latest take on the horror film genre. After a round of Geeton Ka Ghanchakkar (The Horror Edition) and Filmi Khabrein, we discuss how Pari fits into the Bollywood horror films tradition as part of our main segment Bollywood Behes.>

item.title: #3 Remembering Sridevi
item.itunes:summary: Episode 3: In our third episode, we pay tribute to Bollywood icon Sridevi. After a round of Geeton Ka Ghanchakkar dedicated to famous songs featuring Sridevi and Filmi Khabrein, we discuss the Bollywood star’s legacy as part of our main segment Bollywood Behes.>
item.description: Episode 3: In our third episode, we pay tribute to Bollywood icon Sridevi. After a round of Geeton Ka Ghanchakkar dedicated to famous songs featuring Sridevi and Filmi Khabrein, we discuss the Bollywood star’s legacy as part of our main segment Bollywood Behes.>

item.title: #2 Aiyyary
item.itunes:summary: Episode 2: In our second episode, after a round of Geeton Ka Ghanchakkar (where we discuss Bollywood songs stuck in our heads) and Filmi Khabrein, we discuss Bollywood’s spy films in our main segment Bollywood Behes.>
item.description: Episode 2: In our second episode, after a round of Geeton Ka Ghanchakkar (where we discuss Bollywood songs stuck in our heads) and Filmi Khabrein, we discuss Bollywood’s spy films in our main segment Bollywood Behes.>

item.title: #1 Pad Man
item.itunes:summary: Episode 1: In the debut episode, an introduction to Khabardaar podcast, a quick hit of Bollywood news, and then the main segment - discussing Pad Man taking on the theme of menstruation and sanitary pads.>
item.description: Episode 1: In the debut episode, an introduction to Khabardaar podcast, a quick hit of Bollywood news, and then the main segment - discussing Pad Man taking on the theme of menstruation and sanitary pads.>

item.title: Introducing Khabardaar!
item.itunes:summary: Teaser: A quick introduction to Khabardaar’s two hosts, Aparita Bhandari and Baisakhi Roy.>
item.description: Teaser: A quick introduction to Khabardaar’s two hosts, Aparita Bhandari and Baisakhi Roy.>
